Text:
Errata as of 11/26/2011
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THINGS THAT ARE WRONG OR MAY BE CONFUSING
Page Location        Description
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
75   Ex. 2.8(b,d)    Make no sense since they would produce negative results. 
76   Ex. 2.17        "decimal" --> "signed-magnitude"         
126  ln 4 equation   "ns" --> "s"      
155  Sec. 3.9.5 ln 8 "higher" --> "lower"        
176  Ex. 3.22        "seven" --> "twelve"
261  Tbl 5-18, ln 2,3  Insert keyword "range" after "type-name"
301  box, ln 6-7     "after" --> "before"; "8'bs11111111" --> "8'sb11111111"
375  lns -10, -4     "output-control" --> "output-enable"
387  lns -2, -1      "the enable input" --> "two enable inputs"
431  ln 1, Tbl 6-39 title & ln 1  "74x540" --> "74x541"
432  Tbl 6-41 title  "2-bit" --> "8-bit"
433  ln 2 (equation) "Y" --> "iY";  "iD" --> "iDj"
440  Sec. 6.7.4 ln 2 "4-input, 2-bit" --> "2-input, 4-bit"
445  Tbl 6-50 ln 13  delete -- variable i is not needed
460  ln 10           "Tbl 6-56" --> "Tbl 6-60"
471  ln -5           Delete "to 0"
510  Ex 6.23 ln 6    "available" --> "available to replace the '20"
602  box, ln -1      "six" --> "three"
725  ln -1           "posedge CLR_L" --> "negedge CLR_L"
782  ln 11           "NEWBYTE" --> "SLOAD"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FAIRLY HARMLESS STUFF
Page Location        Description
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
37   ln 16           Superscript "2" should be subscript (two places)
71   ln -12          Delete the first "than"
72   box, line -3    Sentence should end with a period, not comma
107  ln -6           "transistor"-->"transistor (or series transistors in a
                     multi-input gate)"; "it"-->"it (them)"
271  ln -6           "5.3.8" --> "5.3.9"
274  Tbl 5-32 ln 10  "generate" should be in color
275  Tbl 5-34 ln 11  "generate" should be in color
281  ln -1           "STD_LOGIC VECTOR" --> "STD_LOGIC_VECTOR"
287  box, para. 2, ln 2  "the the" --> "the"
314  box, para. 4, ln 3  "errors give" --> "errors and give"
338  Ex. 5.16 ln 1   "one the" --> "one of the"
378  ln 9            "XOR's" --> "XOR's inputs"
409  Tbl 6-26 ln 7   "or" should be in color (4 places)
428  Tbl 6-36 ln -5  "RANGE" should be in color
429  Tbl 6-37 ln -6, -8  Apostrophes should not be in color
455  Tbl 6-58 ln -3  "end if" should be in color
456  Tbl 6-60 ln -5  "else p = p" should be indented
467  ln -3, -4       "NATURAL" should not be in color
473  Tbl 6-69 ln 3   "AGTBIN" should not be in color
485  ln -8           "c" should not be in color
498  ln 21,24,28,29  "loop", "loop", "in", "for" should be in color
501  Tbl 6-81 ln -19 "for" should be in color
510  Ex 6.23 ln 6    "available" --> "available to replace the '20"
511  Ex. 6.29, ln 1  "forth" --> "fourth"
628  Tbl 7-36 ln -1  "end;" --> "end process;"
629  Fig 7-97        "Zn" --> "Z"
638  Tbl 7-47 ln -8  "if" should be in color
638  ln 4            "we can" --> "we can use"
645  ln 9            "5.3.8" --> "5.3.9"
647  Tbl 7-55 ln 5,13  "posedge" should be in color
652  ln 3            "assigned" --> "assigned to"
653  Tbl 7-59 ln 5   "or" should be in color
659  ln 4            "five" --> "four"
659  ln 5            "entity" --> "module" (2 places)
659  ln 7            "Component declaration" --> "Instantiation"
659  ln 9 (step 3)   Delete
659  ln 10,11        Renumber to be steps 3 and 4
687  ln -3           "package (DIP)" --> "pin (DIP) package"
696  ln 4,-4         "Exercise" --> "Drill"
725  Tbl 8-19 ln -5  "in" should be in color
751  Tbl 8-38 ln -6  "if" should be in color
778  Sec 8.9.7 ln 3  "between" --> "between a"
791  Ex 8.16         "0001" --> "00001"
811  ln 7            "EPROMS" --> "EPROMs"
815  ln -5           "OE_L"-->"OE", "CS_L"-->"CS" (for consistency)
826  ln 13           "OE_L"-->"OE", "CS_L"-->"CS" (for consistency)
831  ln -14          "that sampled"-->"that is sampled"
---------------------------------------

Hi,

Does anyone have the supplementary material(source file, student problem solution,....)?

That would be great if someone can upload it.
